_____________________________________________CSS___________________________________________________________




body{
    background-color:bisque;
    border: 20px;
    border-color:purple;
   
}
h1{
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: overline;
    text-shadow: 4px;
    color:purple;
    text-size-adjust: 45px;
    text-transform: capitalize;
   background-color: aqua;
   font-size: 40px;
   font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
   text-decoration:double;
   
    
}
#demo{
    background-color: rgb(42, 165, 112);
    text-transform: lowercase;
    text-decoration: solid;
    text-align: center;
    color: rgb(25, 6, 19);
    text-size-adjust: 20px;
    font-size: 30px;
    font-family:fantasy;
}
#demoi{
    background-color:rgb(42, 165, 81);
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: solid;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-size-adjust: 25px;
    color: rgb(10, 7, 10);
    font-family: fantasy;
  
   
    
}
img{
    align-items: center;
    padding-left: 350px;
  

}
